org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint

类 CheckpointOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint.CheckpointOptions
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CheckpointOptions
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Options for performing the checkpoint.

    The CheckpointProperties are related and cover properties that are only relevant at the CheckpointCoordinator. These options are relevant at the StatefulTask instances running on task managers.

    另请参阅:
